head.title: Which got character are you?
head.description: Discover which Game of Thrones character you are by answering questions about your personality and personal philosophy.

header.takeTheTest: Take the test and find out

questions: If someone told you that your partner is cheating on you, what would you do?
If you could travel to the time of your country's declaration of independence, what would you do?
What is your opinion on astrology?
What makes you happy? What are your goals?

answers.author: jon
answers.text: I would dismiss the accusation because I would trust the person I have chosen.

answers.author: tyrion
answers.text: I might think that it could be true and it probably would partly be my fault because that could mean I wouldn't have given my partner what he or she wanted or needed.

answers.author: daenerys
answers.text: I would confront my partner face to face and ask them to look me in the eyes and tell me the truth.

answers.author: cersei
answers.text: I would carefully watch their every move. I would look for evidence and if I found any, I would see how to get even. No one messes with me.

answers.author: petyr
answers.text: It may be true or not, but first I would analyze who is telling me: they could be interested in getting my partner free from commitments.

answers.author: sansa
answers.text: I don't know. But if this person was the love of my life, I might be able to forgive an infidelity.

answers.author: jon
answers.text: I would join the military forces fighting for the independence.

answers.author: sansa
answers.text: It's hard for me to say. I'm not all that interested in politics.

answers.author: daenerys
answers.text: I see myself taking a political initiative to free slaves and help them join the rebel forces. I am a natural leader.

answers.author: petyr
answers.text: I would publicly support the loyalists just in case they win, but secretly provide weapons to the independentists.

answers.author: cersei
answers.text: I wouldn't really care as long as my family comes out of the conflict well-positioned.

answers.author: tyrion
answers.text: Given that my strongest weapon is my words and not my physical strength, I would advise on the risks associated with declaring independence, consider all possible strategies, and recommend the most appropriate one.

answers.author: daenerys
answers.text: As strange as it may seem, horoscopes are often surprisingly accurate.

answers.author: tyrion
answers.text: I don't believe in astrology or horoscopes as I consider them to be pseudo-science nonsense.

answers.author: petyr
answers.text: I don't really care for horoscopes because I don't need to ask people about their zodiac sign to read them as an open book.

answers.author: jon
answers.text: I may occasionally check horoscopes out of curiosity, but I don't take them too seriously as I believe that I control my own destiny through my own choices and actions.

answers.author: cersei
answers.text: It only serves as an illusion for weak people. It's a placebo.

answers.author: sansa
answers.text: I find horoscopes interesting and sometimes very entertaining, but I believe that ultimately our fate is determined by a higher power.

answers.author: sansa
answers.text: To form a beautiful and loving family.

answers.author: cersei
answers.text: Witnessing those who did me wrong suffer.

answers.author: jon
answers.text: To be up to the expectations of my loved ones.

answers.author: daenerys
answers.text: To aid the oppressed and fight for social justice.

answers.author: tyrion
answers.text: I don't ask for too much. I'm happy as long as I can indulge in the pleasures of life, like a good drink.

answers.author: petyr
answers.text: I am motivated by a desire for success, whether that means accumulating wealth, gaining power, or achieving fame.
